name: Weiwu Zhang
description: Weiwu Zhang is a pioneering technologist and thought leader in the blockchain and web3 space. With over 10 years of experience, he has worked on alt currency design, trading algorithms, and served as a blockchain architect at the Commonwealth Bank of Australia and R3 Global Architect Office. He has been an architect for three altcoins and seven ICO projects. Zhang drives innovation in token standards like ERC-5169 and EIP-7738, shaping the future of digital interactions through projects like Bab
